chinese: 我只希望朱莉·贝克能离我远点
english: All I ever wanted was for Juli Baker to leave me alone.

chinese: 故事始于一年级暑假 1957年的夏天
english: It all began in the summer of 1957, before the start of second grade.

chinese: 我们到家啦
english: Here we are.

chinese: 你们觉得这里怎么样?      我挺喜欢的
english: What do you guys think?        I like this place.

chinese: 很赞呢      我的房间是什么颜色?
english: It's cool.        Uh, what color is my room?

chinese: 别急嘛
english: Just you wait.

chinese: 咱们进去瞧瞧      嘿 布莱斯
english: Let's see what's inside.        Hey, come on, buddy Bryce.

chinese: 过来给我搭把手搬东西
english: Why don't, uh, you and I go help unload the van

chinese: 让姑娘们去整理厨房吧
english: and the womenfolk here can get in the kitchen and start setting up.

chinese: 好的 老爸
english: Okay, Dad.

chinese: 于我而言 这意味着我从此步入了
english: For me, it was the beginning of what would be

chinese: 长达五年的不安与逃避生涯
english: more than half a decade of strategic avoidance and social discomfort.

chinese: 嗨 我是朱莉·贝克      喂喂喂 你干嘛呢?
english: Hi, I'm Juli Baker.        Hey, hey, what are you doing?

chinese: 要我帮忙吗?
english: Don't you want some help?

chinese: 不必了 那里面都是贵重物品
english: No. There's some valuable things in there.

chinese: 那我就搬这个吧      不用了
english: How about this one?        No, no, no.

chinese: 赶紧回家吧 你妈妈没准在找你呢
english: Run home. Your mother's probably wondering where you are.

chinese: 没关系 我妈妈知道我在哪 她同意我过来
english: Oh, no, my mom knows where I am. She said it's fine.

chinese: 显然这姑娘也太不识趣了
english: It didn't take long to realize this girl could not take a hint.

chinese: 咱们仨在这儿有点挤吧      不要紧啊
english: It's crowded in here with three people.        I don't mind.

chinese: 毫无自知之明      我们一起推吧?
english: Of any kind.        You wanna push this one together?

chinese: 布莱斯 你妈妈还等着你去帮忙吧?
english: Bryce, isn't it time for you to go help your mother?

chinese: 是啊是啊
english: Oh, yeah.

chinese: 我真是拿她没辙
english: I mean, nothing would stop her.

chinese: 我终于忍无可忍 这时候诡异的事情却发生了
english: I was about to tell her to get lost when the weirdest thing happened.

chinese: 我真是难以置信
english: I couldn't believe it.

chinese: 我居然会牵着陌生女孩的手
english: There I was holding hands with this strange girl.

chinese: 我咋就惹上了这种麻烦?      你好呀
english: How did I get into this mess?        Well, hello.

chinese: 看来你已经认识我儿子了
english: I see you've met my son

chinese: 我不得不使出7岁男生仅有的气概
english: Finally, I did the only manly thing available when you're 7 years old.

chinese: 然而 还有一大串的麻烦等着我
english: However, my troubles were far from over.

chinese: 就在我走进叶尔森老师的教室时
english: The minute I walked into Miss Yelson's classroom

chinese: 布莱斯? 你也在这啊
english: Bryce? You're here.

chinese: 很显然
english: it was clear:

chinese: 即使在学校 也无法逃脱她的魔掌
english: School would not be a sanctuary.

chinese: 嘿 布莱斯 你女朋友呢?
english: Hey, Bryce, where's your girlfriend?

chinese: 枉我一世英名啊
english: I was branded for life.

chinese: 嘿 布莱斯 你咋不向她求婚呢?
english: Hey, Bryce, why don't you ask her to marry you?

chinese: 布莱斯和朱莉爬上树梢
english: Bryce and Juli sitting in a tree

chinese: 卿卿我我甜如蜜
english: K-l-S-S-l-N-G

chinese: 搬来镇上的第一年简直就是场灾难
english: My first year in town was a disaster.

chinese: 瞧那小两口呀
english: Look at them.

chinese: 接下来的三年也不尽如人意
english: And the next three weren't much better.

chinese: 就这么捱到了六年级 我总算不再坐以待毙
english: But finally, in the sixth grade, I took action.

chinese: 想到了一个大狠招
english: I hatched the plan.

chinese: 雪利
english: Sherry.

chinese: 雪利 等一下
english: Sherry, wait up.

chinese: 嗨 布莱斯
english: Hi, Bryce. Heh.

chinese: 我向雪利·斯道尔斯展开攻势
english: I asked out Sherry Stalls.

chinese: 我想问你愿不愿意...
english: I was wondering if you wanted to go

chinese: 这个招数的绝妙之处在于
english: To full appreciate the brilliance of this plan

chinese: 雪利·斯道尔斯是朱莉的眼中钉
english: you have to understand that Juli hated Sherry Stalls

chinese: 但我始终想不通其中的缘由
english: though I never understood why.

chinese: 雪利长发飘飘 为人和善
english: Sherry was nice, friendly and she had a lot of hair.

chinese: 我妈之前一直不让我打耳洞 后来我拼命求她
english: At first, my mother wouldn't let me get my ears pierced, but I begged

chinese: 我原本一心指望 只要和雪利吃吃饭
english: The idea was that Sherry would eat with me

chinese: 散散步 就能让朱莉知难而退
english: maybe we'd walk around together, and hopefully Juli would lose interest.

chinese: 她还是不允许我16岁前打耳洞
english: But I still can't get the hoops till I'm 16.

chinese: 太可惜了
english: Oh, that's a shame.

chinese: 米娜妮也想打耳洞
english: So Melanie wanted to get her ears pierced,

chinese: 但她老妈也不是省油的灯
english: but of course her mother said no.

chinese: 她就在家大发雷霆
english: So she threw a fit

chinese: 把约翰尼·马蒂斯的精选辑给砸了
english: and smashed her Johnny Mathis Greatest Hits album

chinese: 结果就被禁足了
english: and she got grounded,

chinese: 连我的睡衣派对都来不了
english: so now she can't come to my pajama sleepover party.

chinese: 事情进展相当顺利
english: Things were unfolding quite nicely.

chinese: 你的科学实验打算怎么做?
english: What are you doing for your science project?

chinese: 直到我所谓的挚友加利特·埃恩德
english: That is, until my supposed best friend, Garrett Einbinder

chinese: 开始打起了雪利的主意
english: took an interest in Sherry himself.

chinese: 我想展示各种护发素
english: I was thinking of showing how split ends react

chinese: 如何修复头发分叉
english: with different hair conditioners.

chinese: 太棒了
english: That's fascinating.

chinese: 俗话说得好 重色必轻友 加利特这个叛徒
english: Loyalty gave way to desire and Garrett, the turncoat

chinese: 向雪利全盘托出我的计划
english: told Sherry what I was up to.

chinese: 混蛋
english: Jerk.

chinese: 她自然很是生气
english: She didn't take it well.

chinese: 至于朱莉
english: Word got back to Juli,

chinese: 她自然又开始对我故技重施
english: and pretty soon she started up with the goo-goo eyes again.

chinese: 而且还变本加厉
english: Only this time it was worse.

chinese: 居然开始嗅我
english: She started sniffing me.

chinese: 你没听错 她居然用鼻子嗅我
english: That's right, sniffing me.

chinese: 搞什么飞机啊?
english: What was that all about?

chinese: 我只能期望来年能摆脱魔掌
english: My only consolation was that next year would be different.

chinese: 但愿升入初中后
english: Junior high, bigger school.

chinese: 不用再和她同班
english: Maybe we'd be in different classes

chinese: 彻底结束我的噩梦
english: and it would finally, finally be over.

chinese: 见到布莱斯·罗斯基的第一眼 我便怦然心动了
english: The first day I met Bryce Loski, I flipped.

chinese: 他的双眸让我如痴如醉
english: It was those eyes, something in those dazzling eyes.

chinese: 我们一起推吧?
english: You wanna push this one together?

chinese: 那时候他们刚搬到我家隔壁
english: His family had just moved into the neighborhood

chinese: 我过去帮他们搬东西
english: and I'd gone over to help them.

chinese: 我在车里刚呆了2分钟
english: I'd been in the van all of two minutes

chinese: 他老爸就让她去帮他妈妈
english: when his dad sent him off to help his mom.

chinese: 我知道他并不想离开
english: I could see he didn't wanna go.

chinese: 于是我追上前去
english: So I chased after him to see

chinese: 问他能不能先玩一会再进屋
english: if we could play a little before he got trapped inside.

chinese: 接着他便用力握着我的手
english: The next thing I know, he's holding my hand

chinese: 与我深情凝视
english: and looking right into my eyes.

chinese: 那一刹那 我的心停止了跳动
english: My heart stopped.

chinese: 这一刻到来了吗?
english: Was this it?

chinese: 是时候迎来我的初吻了吗?
english: Would this be my first kiss?

chinese: 没想到他妈妈却出来了      你好呀
english: But then his mother came out.        Well, hello.

chinese: 他感到无比羞愧 脸都红了
english: And he was so embarrassed, his cheeks turned completely red.

chinese: 那晚我躺在床上 不停幻想初吻的场景
english: I went to bed that night thinking of the kiss that might have been.

chinese: 我知道他对我动心了
english: I mean, it was clear he had feelings for me,

chinese: 只是怯于表达爱意
english: but he was just too shy to show them.

chinese: 妈妈说过男孩子都会这样
english: My mother said boys were like that.

chinese: 我决定帮他克服心中的恐惧
english: So I decided to help him out.

chinese: 布莱斯? 你也在这啊
english: Bryce? You're here.

chinese: 我会竭尽所能帮他彻底释放自我
english: I would give him plenty of opportunity to get over his shyness.

chinese: 六年级那年 我学着有所收敛
english: By the sixth grade, I'd learned to control myself.

chinese: 没想到半路却杀出个雪利·斯道尔斯
english: Then Sherry Stalls entered the picture.

chinese: 雪利·斯道尔斯就是一人尽可夫的长舌妇
english: Sherry Stalls was nothing but a whiny, gossipy, backstabbing flirt.

chinese: 头发长见识短
english: All hair and no substance.

chinese: 而且她竟然...
english: And there she was

chinese: 和布莱斯十指紧扣 那可是我家布莱斯
english: holding hands with Bryce. My Bryce.

chinese: 我的初吻白马王子
english: The one who was walking around with my first kiss.

chinese: 我决定对她视而不见 依照布莱斯的品性
english: My solution was to ignore her. I knew a boy of Bryce's caliber

chinese: 总有一天能意识到雪利有多浅薄无知
english: would eventually see through a shallow conniver like Sherry Stalls.

chinese: 如我所料 他俩一周后便分手了
english: It took all of a week. They broke up at recess.

chinese: 她也不看看自己几斤几两
english: She didn't take it well.

chinese: 自从布莱斯摆脱了朱莉的魔掌
english: Now that Bryce was out of Sherry's evil clutches,

chinese: 对我也变得更为友善
english: he started being nicer to me.

chinese: 嗨 朱莉      嗨 布莱斯
english: Hi, Juli.        Hi, Bryce.

chinese: 他如此腼腆可人
english: He was so shy and so cute

chinese: 他的发丝间弥漫着西瓜的香氛
english: and his hair, it smelled like watermelon.

chinese: 我简直如痴如醉
english: I couldn't get enough of it.

chinese: 整整一年我都沉浸在这迷人的芬芳里
english: I spent the whole year secretly sniffing watermelon

chinese: 期盼着何时能迎来我的初吻
english: and wondering if I was ever going to get my kiss.

chinese: 升入初一后 生活开始有所改观
english: Seventh grade brought changes, all right.

chinese: 但最大的变化并非学校
english: But the biggest one didn't happen at school.

chinese: 而是出现在家中
english: It happened at home.

chinese: 外公搬来与我们同住
english: My grandfather came to live with us.

chinese: 妈妈说他是过于思念外婆 才会如此迷惘
english: Mom said he stared like that because he missed Grandma.

chinese: 但他怎么可能对我推心置腹呢
english: That was not something Grandpa would ever talk about with me.

chinese: 其实他在我面前总是沉默寡言
english: As a matter of fact, he never talked about much of anything with me.

chinese: 直到朱莉的名字登上了当地报纸
english: That is, until Juli appeared in the local newspaper.

chinese: 布莱斯 能和你聊聊吗?      有事吗?
english: Oh, Bryce. May I speak with you?        What?

chinese: 坐吧 孩子
english: Have a seat, son.

chinese: 跟我说说你的朋友朱莉·贝克吧
english: Tell me about your friend Juli Baker.

chinese: 其实朱莉算不上是我朋友
english: Juli. She's not exactly my friend.

chinese: 为什么呢?
english: Oh. Why's that?

chinese: 你怎么突然问这个?
english: Why do you wanna know?

chinese: 朱莉·贝克登上梅菲尔德时报
english: Now, Juli Baker did not wind up in The Mayfield Times

chinese: 可不是因为她天赋异禀
english: for being an eighth-grade Einstein.

chinese: 而是因为她赖在无花果树上
english: No, she got front-page coverage because she refused

chinese: 死活不肯下来
english: to climb out of a sycamore tree.

chinese: 朱莉·贝克和那棵白痴无花果树
english: Juli Baker and that stupid sycamore tree.

chinese: 她认为那棵树
english: She always thought it was God's gift

chinese: 是上帝对我们的恩赐
english: to our little corner of the universe.

chinese: 嘿 布莱斯 过来和我们一起爬树不?
english: Hey, Bryce. Wanna come climb the tree with me and my brothers?

chinese: 不了 谢谢
english: No, thanks.

chinese: 布莱斯 快上来嘛 很好玩的
english: Bryce. Come up here. It's fun.

chinese: 可以看到全世界呢      我没空
english: You can see everything.        I can't.

chinese: 我爸爸让我帮他去修...
english: My dad needs me to help him fix

chinese: 修东西
english: a thing.

chinese: 拉倒吧
english: That's all I needed.

chinese: 我才不要和朱莉·贝克一起爬树呢
english: Climb up a tree with Juli Baker.

chinese: 我可不想重温二年级的噩梦
english: I'd be dragged right back into the second grade.

chinese: 布莱斯和朱莉爬上树梢
english: Bryce and Juli sitting in a tree.

chinese: 我宁可下半辈子吃青豆度日
english: Why don't you just make me eat lima beans for the rest of my life.

chinese: 还有三个街区就来了
english: It's three blocks away.

chinese: 只剩两个喽
english: Two blocks.

chinese: 还有最后一个
english: One block away.

chinese: 还真把自己当回事      最受不了她这种人了
english: Like that's valuable information.        I hate it when she does that.

chinese: 真希望校车哪天能罢工
english: I like to think there's at least a chance the bus won't show.

chinese: 这棵树在晨曦中显得尤为美丽 你说对么?
english: I think the tree looks particularly beautiful in this light. Don't you?

chinese: 如果你所谓的美丽是指奇丑无比
english: If by "beautiful" you mean "unbelievably ugly,"

chinese: 那我绝对赞成
english: then, yes, I would agree.

chinese: 你眼神不太好吧 我真同情你
english: You're just visually challenged. I feel sorry for you.

chinese: 眼神不太好?
english: "Visually challenged"?

chinese: 眼神不太好?
english: "Visually challenged"?

chinese: 她家不也是街坊邻里的笑柄么
english: This from the girl who lived in a house

chinese: 居然敢这么说我?
english: that was the joke of the neighborhood?

chinese: 灌木爬满了窗台 门前杂草丛生
english: They had bushes growing over windows and weeds all over the place.

chinese: 我老爸为此很是不爽
english: It bugged my dad bigtime.

chinese: 哟 快瞧瞧
english: Oh, there he is.

chinese: 砌墙工当自己是大画家呢
english: The bricklayer who thinks he's a painter.

chinese: 嫌那破车不够寒碜
english: That truck's not ugly enough in real life?

chinese: 还得画幅画裱起来?
english: He's gotta make a painting of it?

chinese: 人家的风景画可是集市上的抢手货
english: No, he does landscapes. Sells them at the county fair.

chinese: 大家都夸赞他呢
english: People say they're beautiful.

chinese: 风景画? 要我说吧
english: Landscapes? Let me tell you something.

chinese: 他要是能把院子拾掇拾掇
english: The world would have more beauty in it

chinese: 这个世界一定会更加美好
english: if he'd do a little landscaping on that piece of crap he calls a yard.

chinese: 我真同情他老婆 嫁了这么个幻想家
english: I feel bad for his wife. She married a dreamer.

chinese: 梦想与现实间的冲突 总得有一个人来承受
english: Because of that, one of the two of them will always be unhappy.

chinese: 没错 可为啥要殃及无辜呢?
english: Yeah, fine. But why do we have to be unhappy?

chinese: 和朱莉·贝克成天赖在树上相比
english: As annoying as the yard was to my dad

chinese: 她家那院子其实也不见得有多惹人生厌
english: it was nothing compared to how annoying Juli Baker was in that tree.

chinese: 还有三个街区哦
english: Three blocks away.

chinese: 每天早上我们都不得不忍受
english: Every morning we had to listen to the sound

chinese: 她极为啰嗦的交通播报
english: of her blow-by-blow traffic report.

chinese: 还有两个了
english: Two blocks.

chinese: 到喽
english: There you go.

chinese: 为什么要叫"三个臭皮匠"呢?
english: Why do they call it The Three Stooges?

chinese: 明明有五个人啊      什么?
english: I mean, there's five of them.        What?

chinese: 你看啊 莫伊 拉里 克里 谢普和卷毛乔伊
english: Well, yeah, there's Moe, Larry, Curly, Shemp and Curly Joe.

chinese: 可每场戏却只有三个人      是啊
english: Yeah, but they only have three at a time.        Yeah.

chinese: 我讨厌卷毛乔伊 他哪算得上臭皮匠呢
english: You know, I hate Curly Joe. I mean, he shouldn't even be a Stooge.

chinese: 姑娘 我可要报警了
english: Listen, girl, I'm this close to calling the police.

chinese: 你侵犯私人土地 妨碍施工
english: You are trespassing and obstructing progress on a contracted job.

chinese: 怎么了?      你最好自己下来
english: What's going on?        Either you come down

chinese: 要不我们就砍树了      你们赶紧上来吧
english: or we're gonna cut you down.        You guys, come up here with me.

chinese: 咱们人一多他们就不敢砍了
english: They won't cut it down if we're all up here.

chinese: 车来了      朱莉真是疯了
english: Bus, bus, bus.        Juli was frantic.

chinese: 他们想把树给砍了
english: They wanted to cut down her tree.

chinese: 真不明白那无比畸形的树
english: I couldn't understand why that mutant tangle of gnarly branches

chinese: 在她心里怎么就那么重要      布莱斯 求你了
english: meant so much to her.        Bryce, please.

chinese: 我很同情她      别管她
english: I felt bad for her.        Leave her.

chinese: 但我可不至于为此旷课
english: But I wasn't about to cut school over it.

chinese: 走吧 哥们儿
english: Come on, bro.

chinese: 你为什么不把她当朋友呢 布莱斯?
english: Why isn't she your friend, Bryce?

chinese: 等你真正了解朱莉就明白了
english: You'd have to know Juli.

chinese: 我倒真想认识她
english: Well, I'd like to.

chinese: 为什么?
english: Why?

chinese: 这姑娘挺有骨气的
english: That girl has an iron backbone.

chinese: 要不你抽空请她来家里玩?
english: Why don't you invite her over sometime?

chinese: 有骨气?
english: An iron backbone?

chinese: 她那是一根筋
english: She's just stubborn

chinese: 而且还很自以为是
english: and she's pushy beyond belief.

chinese: 是这样吗?
english: Is that so?

chinese: 她从二年级起就老是缠着我
english: And she's been stalking me since the second grade.

chinese: 这种女孩可是可遇不可求的
english: Well, a girl like that doesn't live next door to everyone.

english: Lucky them.

chinese: 看看这个
english: Read this.

english: Without prejudice.

chinese: 我才没兴趣去了解朱莉·贝克

english: Juli wasn't at the bus stop the next morning.

chinese: 第三天也不见她出现
english: Or the morning after that.

chinese: 不知道她怎么来学校的
english: She was at school, but you'd never know it.

english: Little Joe? He's got so much makeup on        He doesn't age.

chinese: 我告诉自己应该感到庆幸
english: I told myself I should be glad about it.

english: I mean, isn't that what I'd always wanted?

chinese: 但我仍替她感到难过
english: But still, I felt bad for her.

chinese: 我想跟她说声对不起 但是一想 还是算了
english: I was gonna tell her I was sorry, but then I thought, hey, no

chinese: 我可真不希望
english: that's the last thing I needed:

chinese: 让朱莉·贝克以为我在想她
english: Juli Baker thinking I missed her.

english: I see why you like to come out here.

chinese: 那你能开导开导你老妈不?
english: Would you mind explaining it to your mother?

english: I loved to watch my father paint.

chinese: 更喜欢在他画画时和他聊天
english: Or really, I loved to hear him talk while he painted.

english: I learned a lot about my dad that way.

chinese: 他和我无话不谈
english: He told me all sorts of things

english: like how he got his first job delivering hay

chinese: 他多么渴望能完成学业
english: and how he'd wished he'd finished college.

chinese: 有一天 他出人意料地问我
english: Then one day he surprised me.

english: What's going on with you and, uh, Bryce Loski?

chinese: 什么怎么回事啊? 没什么呀
english: What do you mean? Nothing.

chinese: 那好吧
english: Oh, okay.

chinese: 是我想多了
english: My mistake.

chinese: 你怎么会这么想?
english: Why would you even think that?

chinese: 其实也没什么
english: No reason.

chinese: 只是你成天
english: Just that you

english: talk about him all the time.

chinese: 我有吗?
english: I do?

chinese: 我也不知道
english: I don't know.

chinese: 也许我被他的双眼所吸引吧
english: I guess it's something about his eyes.

chinese: 还有他迷人的微笑
english: Or maybe his smile.

chinese: 那他人怎么样?
english: But what about him?

chinese: 什么?      你得考虑画的整体效果
english: What?        You have to look at the whole landscape.

chinese: 什么意思?
english: What does that mean?

chinese: 一幅画绝非简单拼凑就能完成
english: A painting is more than the sum of its parts.

english: A cow by itself is just a cow.

english: A meadow by itself is just grass, flowers.

english: And the sun peeking through the trees is just a beam of light.

english: But you put them all together

chinese: 却能收获意想不到的成果
english: and it can be magic.

chinese: 我对他的话一知半解 直到一天下午
english: I didn't really understand what he was saying until one afternoon

english: when I was up in the sycamore tree.

english: I was rescuing a kite.

english: It was a long way up, higher than I'd ever been.

english: And the higher I got, the more amazed I was by the view.

chinese: 沁人心脾的微风迎面扑来
english: I began to notice how wonderful the breeze smelled.

chinese: 夹杂着阳光和野草的芬芳
english: Like sunshine and wild grass.

chinese: 我忍不住大口呼吸
english: I couldn't stop breathing it in

chinese: 让肺里溢满甜美醉人的气息
english: filling my lungs with the sweetest smell I'd ever known.

chinese: 嘿 我的风筝被你找到了
english: Hey, you found my kite.

chinese: 布莱斯 你真该上来看看
english: Bryce, you should come up here.

chinese: 太美了
english: It's so beautiful.

chinese: 不行 我扭伤了...
english: I can't. I sprained my, um

chinese: 我出疹子了
english: I have a rash.

chinese: 从那一刻起 我彻底爱上了这里
english: From that moment on, that became my spot.

chinese: 我可以坐上好几个钟头 静静欣赏这世界
english: I could sit there for hours, just looking out at the world.

chinese: 落日时而泛着微醺的紫红
english: Some days the sunsets would be purple and pink.

chinese: 时而迸发出橙色的余晖
english: And some days they were a blazing orange

chinese: 瞬间布满天边的晚霞
english: setting fire to the clouds on the horizon.

chinese: 在如此瑰丽的景象中
english: It was during one of those sunsets that my father's idea

chinese: 我终于慢慢有所领悟
english: of the whole being greater than the sum of its parts

chinese: 爸爸所说的整体胜于全部
english: moved from my head to my heart.

chinese: 有时我会起个大早 只为去看日出
english: Some days I would get there extra early to watch the sunrise.

chinese: 一天清晨 我在心里兀自揣度
english: One morning I was making mental notes

chinese: 应该如何向爸爸描绘
english: of how the streaks of light were cutting through the clouds

chinese: 缕缕曙光穿透云层的景象
english: so I could tell my dad

chinese: 下面却传来阵阵嘈杂
english: when I heard a noise below.

chinese: 不好意思
english: Excuse me.

chinese: 抱歉 你们不能停在这里 这是校车站台
english: Excuse me. I'm sorry, but you can't park there. That's a bus stop.

chinese: 你在上面干嘛呢?
english: Hey, what are you doing up there?

chinese: 赶紧下来 我们要砍树了
english: You can't be up there, we're gonna take this thing down.

chinese: 砍这棵树?      没错 快下来吧
english: The tree?        Yeah. Now come on down.

chinese: 谁批准你们砍树的?      树的主人啊
english: But who told you, you could cut it down?        The owner.

chinese: 为什么?
english: Why?

chinese: 他想在这里建房 这棵树挡道了
english: He's gonna build a house, and this tree's in the way.

chinese: 姑娘 赶紧下来吧 我们得开工了
english: So come on, girl, we got work to do.

chinese: 你们不能砍这棵树 不能砍
english: You can't cut it down. You just can't.

chinese: 姑娘 你再不下来我就报警了
english: Listen, girl. I'm this close to calling the police.

chinese: 你侵犯私人土地 妨碍施工
english: You are trespassing and obstructing progress on a contracted job.

chinese: 你再不下来 我们就直接砍了
english: Now either you come down, or we're gonna cut you down.

chinese: 来吧 要砍就砍吧
english: Go ahead. Cut me down.

chinese: 我不下去 坚决不下去
english: I'm not coming down. I'm never coming down.

chinese: 布莱斯 你们快上来帮我啊
english: Bryce. You guys, come up here with me.

chinese: 上面人一多 他们就不敢砍了
english: They won't cut it down if we're all up here.

chinese: 布莱斯 别让他们砍树啊
english: Bryce, please don't let them do this.

chinese: 求你们了
english: Come on, you guys.

chinese: 布莱斯 求你了 你不用爬很高的
english: Bryce, please. You don't have to come up this high. Just a little ways.

chinese: 布莱斯 求求你了
english: Bryce, please. Please.

chinese: 从那之后 一切都变得模糊起来
english: What happened after that was a blur.

chinese: 似乎整个镇上的人都围了过来
english: It seemed like the whole town was there.

chinese: 但我一直坚持不肯下去
english: But still I wouldn't move.

chinese: 爸爸后来赶了过来
english: Then my father showed up.

chinese: 他说服消防员 架了楼梯爬上来
english: He talked a fireman into letting him come up to where I was.

chinese: 宝贝儿 我们下去吧
english: Sweetie, it's time to come down.

chinese: 爸爸 别让他们砍树
english: Daddy, please don't let them do this.

chinese: 宝贝儿      爸爸 你看啊
english: Sweetie        Daddy, look.

chinese: 在这里可以俯瞰整个世界
english: You can see everything. You can see the whole world from here.

chinese: 万里河山也不及我女儿的安危重要 下去吧
english: No view is worth my daughter's safety. Now, come on.

chinese: 我不走
english: I can't.

chinese: 朱莉安娜 别耍小性子了
english: Julianna, it's time to come down now.

chinese: 求你了 爸爸
english: Please, Daddy.

chinese: 听话 下去吧
english: It's time.

chinese: 就这么结束了
english: And that was it.

chinese: 我整整两周都以泪洗面
english: I must've cried for two weeks straight.

chinese: 我仍然坚持上学 异常用功
english: Oh, sure, I went to school and did the best I could

chinese: 却感觉生活失去了重心
english: but nothing seemed to matter.

chinese: 朱莉?      啊?
english: Juli?        Huh?

chinese: 你知道答案是什么吗?
english: Do you know the answer?

chinese: 伯罗奔尼撒战争?
english: Uh, the Peloponnesian War?

chinese: 这也许是某个问题的答案
english: I'm sure that's the answer to something

chinese: 但我问的是菱形的面积
english: but I was looking for the area of a rhomboid.

chinese: 其实 菱形三角形之类的
english: Somehow, rhomboids and isosceles right triangles

chinese: 在我看来并不重要
english: didn't seem so important.

chinese: 我开始骑车上学 只为避开那个伤心地
english: I rode my bike so I wouldn't have to pass by the stump

chinese: 那里曾经矗立着世上最美的无花果树
english: that used to be the earth's most magnificent sycamore tree.

chinese: 但不管我怎么努力 我对它始终心有念想
english: But no matter what I did, I couldn't stop thinking about it.

chinese: 你还好吧?
english: Are you okay?

chinese: 不就是一棵树么
english: It was just a tree.

chinese: 那不仅只是一棵树
english: No, it wasn't just a tree.

chinese: 希望你能将树梢的美好时光永存心底
english: I never want you to forget how you felt when you were up there.

chinese: 谢谢你 爸爸
english: Thanks, Dad.

chinese: 我每天醒来就会看着这幅画
english: It was the first thing I saw every morning

chinese: 它亦每天伴着我入眠
english: and the last thing I saw before I went to sleep.

chinese: 直到有一天看着它 我不再泪眼朦胧
english: And once I could look at it without crying

chinese: 我领悟到了更深层的寓意
english: I saw more than the tree and what being up there meant to me.

chinese: 我的世界观开始有了细微的变化
english: I saw the day that my view of things around me started changing.

chinese: 我不禁问自己 我对布莱斯的感情是否一如往日?
english: And I wondered, did I still feel the same things about Bryce?

chinese: 我向来对鸡蛋不感冒
english: I've never been a huge fan of eggs.

chinese: 既不喜欢 也说不上讨厌
english: I mean, I could always just take them or leave them.

chinese: 但那天在斯凯勒·布朗家的车库里
english: That is, until one day in Skyler Brown's garage

chinese: 让我对鸡蛋的厌恶根深蒂固
english: when my feelings about eggs were solidified.

english: Hey, hey, hey. Guys. Edna's found her breakfast.

english: I mean, if a slimy reptile found them appetizing

english: there was certainly no place for them in my diet.

chinese: 天啊 太给力了
english: Oh, man, that's so cool.

chinese: 她连嚼都不用嚼 省时又省心
english: She doesn't even have to chew. I mean, think of all the time you'd save.

chinese: 都怨我姐姐丽奈特
english: I could've gone my whole life not knowing that snakes eat eggs raw

chinese: 非要来找斯凯勒·布朗商量联赛的事
english: if it hadn't been for Lynetta.

chinese: 要不我这辈子都不想看蛇活吞鸡蛋
english: She had a major-league thing for Skyler Brown.

chinese: 真够恶心的
english: I think it's gross.

english: He and Juli's brothers, Matt and Mark, had formed a band.

english: And Lynetta would watch them practice.

chinese: 太赞了吧
english: That is so neat.

chinese: 你觉得呢 布莱斯?
english: How about that, huh, Bryce?

chinese: 是啊 够给力的
english: Yeah. Neat.

english: So, Brycie, how do you think he's gonna digest that?

english: Stomach acid?        You'd like to think that.

chinese: 等等 别出声 好戏开始了
english: Wait, everybody quiet. Here he goes.

chinese: 这才叫吃鸡蛋啊
english: Eggs over easy.

chinese: 太恶心了 看得我想吐
english: Gross. Gross, gross, gross.

chinese: 等等哈 最精彩的还没出现呢
english: Wait, wait. You haven't seen the best part.

chinese: 好恶啊
english: Gross.

chinese: 我试着佯装淡定 却毫不管用
english: I tried to be casual about it, but it didn't take.

chinese: 我开始做噩梦
english: I started having bad dreams.

chinese: 梦见自己被困在巨型鸡蛋里
english: I'd be trapped inside a huge egg

english: and this monster would open his jaws and start to devour me.

chinese: 所幸每次都能及时醒来
english: I'd wake up just in time.

chinese: 没想到噩梦成真了
english: Then the real nightmare began.

chinese: 嗨 布莱斯 我给你们带了些鸡蛋
english: Hi, Bryce. I brought these over for you and your family.

chinese: 我家养的鸡开始下蛋了      什么?
english: My chickens are laying eggs.        What?

english: You remember Abby and Bonnie and Clyde

chinese: 德克斯特 尤妮丝和弗洛伦斯吗?
english: and Dexter and Eunice and Florence?

english: The ones I hatched for the science fair.        How could I forget?

chinese: 朱莉·贝克总是那么经典
english: It was classic Juli Baker.

chinese: 轻而易举成了全场的焦点
english: She totally dominated the fair.

chinese: 她的课题是观察无聊的鸡蛋孵化过程
english: And get this, her project was all about watching boring eggs hatch.

english: I mean, here I had a live-action erupting volcano

english: and all anyone cared about was Juli's boring chicks

chinese: 更感兴趣
english: breaking out of their boring shells.

chinese: 最后一只出来了
english: Oh, I think the last one's hatching.

chinese: 出来了      出来了啊
english: It's hatching.        Oh, it's hatching.

chinese: 孩子们 快过来
english: Kids, come over here.

chinese: 好吧 我输给她了
english: But hey, she won. I lost.

chinese: 我彻底被无视了
english: I've never been one to dwell.

chinese: 孵出来了
english: Here it comes.

chinese: 但我可不会吃她送来的鸡蛋
english: But that didn't mean I had to eat her lousy eggs.

chinese: 朱莉这姑娘真乖巧 还给我们送鸡蛋
english: I think it was very sweet of Juli to bring us those eggs.

chinese: 我才不吃呢 我明早还是喝燕麦粥
english: I don't care. I'm still having cereal tomorrow.

chinese: 我们怎么能确定这蛋不是孵了一半呢
english: Yeah, how do we know there's no chicks in one of those eggs?

chinese: 我小时候常吃刚下的蛋 很是可口
english: I used to eat farm-fresh eggs when I was a kid. They were delicious.

chinese: 刚下的蛋当然美味了
english: Yeah, well, that's all well and good

chinese: 可万一敲开鸡蛋 掉出一具尸体咋整?
english: but what if we crack one open and a dead chick falls out?

chinese: 他们家有养公鸡吗?
english: Do they have a rooster?

chinese: 如果没有就不是受精蛋
english: If they don't have a rooster the eggs can't be fertile.

chinese: 如果养了公鸡我们也会知道
english: And if they had a rooster, we'd know.

chinese: 街坊邻居都能听到
english: The whole neighborhood would know.

chinese: 万一人家把公鸡变声了呢
english: Maybe they got it de-yodeled.

chinese: 变声?
english: "De-yodeled"?

chinese: 就是把声带给割了
english: You know. De-cock-a-doodle-doo'd.

chinese: 瞎说什么呢你?
english: What the hell are you talking about?

chinese: 就像给狗禁声那样
english: Like they de-bark dogs.

chinese: 布莱斯 你直接问问朱莉不就行了?
english: Bryce, why don't you just ask Juli?

chinese: 还是不要吧      什么?
english: I don't think that        What?

chinese: 你不敢跟她说话?      谁说我不敢跟她说话
english: You afraid to talk to her?        I'm not afraid to talk to her.

chinese: 我看是你不敢吧
english: I know you are, but what am I?

chinese: 好了 你去找她问问清楚吧      布莱斯
english: Okay. Just talk to her and find out.        Bryce.

chinese: 你会如何识别公鸡?
english: How do you tell if one's a rooster?

chinese: 公鸡体型较大 羽毛更长
english: Well, a rooster's bigger. Longer feathers.

chinese: 头上长有红色的鸡冠
english: They've got that red stuff growing out of their head.

chinese: 脖子上也长有红毛      那应该挺好鉴别的吧
english: And around their neck too.        That shouldn't be too hard to spot.

chinese: 你想想啊 鸡通常都长有鸡冠
english: Although, come to think of it, chickens have the rubbery red stuff too.

chinese: 只不过不太明显罢了
english: Just not as much.

chinese: 加利特是公鸡专家
english: Garrett's expertise in roosters

chinese: 他能让我避免直接和朱莉·贝克对峙
english: was the cornerstone of our plan to avoid contact with Juli Baker.

chinese: 我们偷偷溜去她家后院
english: The balance of which involved spying over her back fence.

chinese: 快点 快点      嘘
english: Come on, come on.        Shh. Shh.

chinese: 就在这
english: Over here.

chinese: 我看不清那些鸡啊
english: I can't see the stupid chickens.

chinese: 得把它们从笼子里弄出来
english: We gotta get them out of the coop.

chinese: 那是公鸡吗?
english: Is that a rooster?

chinese: 不是 看起来不像
english: No, it looks like a chicken.

chinese: 你怎么知道?
english: How can you tell?

chinese: 只可意会不可言传
english: It just does.

chinese: 瞧见了吧? 什么叫做专家
english: See what I mean? Expertise.

chinese: 嘘      干嘛?
english: Shh, shh!        What?

chinese: 朱莉
english: Juli.

chinese: 开饭啦 宝贝们
english: Here, guys.

chinese: 出来吧 吃饭喽
english: Go on, there you go.

chinese: 来来来 吃饭哦      没错 都是鸡
english: Here, guys. Go on.        Yeah, they're all chickens.

chinese: 一只公鸡都没有?      非得让我再说一遍?
english: There's no rooster?        What did I just say?

chinese: 你怎么看出来的?
english: How can you tell?

english: Have you seen their yard? It's

english: And thus another near-death experience

english: I'm late.        Be back by 11.

english: That girl's name is Juli. And, no, she isn't working me too hard.

english: You've developed quite a soft spot for her, huh?

chinese: 史蒂芬
english: Steven.

english: No, Patsy. Just wanna find out why your father has the energy

english: Yeah, because he's too busy with his paint-by-numbers kit.

english: If you had a brother with a severe handicap, what would you do?

english: What the hell does that have to do with anything?

english: So what? He's not the gardener, is he? Heh.

chinese: 史蒂芬

english: They don't own that house.

english: The landlord's supposed to maintain it.

english: Mr. Baker puts every extra penny he has into caring for his brother.

english: Don't they have government facilities for that sort of thing?

english: Maybe they thought that a private facility would be better for him.

chinese: 不管怎样 他家的基因有问题
english: Either way, it's not our fault

chinese: 这和基因没什么关系
english: It has nothing to do with chromosomes.

english: When Juli's uncle was born,

chinese: 如果不是缺氧所致
english: If he'd had enough oxygen,

english: he would've been a perfect little baby, just like your son.

chinese: 对不起
english: Sorry about that.

chinese: 因为

chinese: 多亏了上帝的恩宠
english: but for the grace of God

chinese: 否则你妈妈也得和贝克先生同病相怜
english: your mother could be standing in Mr. Baker's shoes.

chinese: 舅舅的脖子也被脐带缠过?
english: Did her brother have the cord wrapped around his neck too?

chinese: 是你
english: You did.

chinese: 所幸替你接生的医生经验丰富
english: Luckily, the doctor who delivered you was on the ball

chinese: 及时把脐带解开了
english: and got it untangled

chinese: 如果稍有不慎就会万劫不复
english: but it easily could've gone the other way.

chinese: 去散散步吗?      什么?
english: Wanna go for a walk?        Huh?

chinese: 能让大脑清醒一下
english: I find it helps clear the mind.

english: What would they have done with me?

chinese: 我们无法预知未曾发生的事
english: You can't dwell on something that might've been, Bryce.

chinese: 看我爸那架势
english: The way my dad was talking,

chinese: 估计会把我扔进精神病院
english: sounds like he would've thrown me in a nuthouse.

chinese: 不 别这么说 这对他不公平
english: No, no. Now, that's not fair.

chinese: 你不能给他加上莫须有的罪名
english: You can't condemn him for something he hasn't done.

chinese: 这就是那棵树 是吗?
english: This is where that tree was, wasn't it?

chinese: 是的
english: Yeah.

chinese: 上面的景色一定特别美妙
english: Must've been a spectacular view.

chinese: 她是个好姑娘
english: She's quite a girl.

chinese: 有些人会渐露平庸
english: Some of us get dipped in flat

chinese: 有些人会小有所成
english: some in satin

chinese: 还有人会出类拔萃
english: some in gloss.

chinese: 但你偶尔才能遇上一个
english: But every once in a while

chinese: 光彩夺目的人
english: you find someone who's iridescent.

chinese: 当你真正遇到这一刻
english: And when you do

chinese: 才能明白其中的美好
english: nothing will ever compare.

chinese: 平庸 拔萃 光彩夺目?
english: Flat, glossy, iridescent?

chinese: 到底是啥意思啊?
english: What the hell did that mean?

chinese: 朱莉·贝克原本在我心里毫不起眼
english: Juli Baker had always just seemed plain to me.

chinese: 直到这一刻才有所改观
english: Until now.

chinese: 当她说起置身树梢的美妙感觉
english: And the way she talked about what it felt like to be up in that tree

chinese: 远离地面 微风轻拂
english: to be held above the earth, brushed by the wind.

chinese: 哪个初中生会说出这种话呢?
english: Who in junior high talks like that?

chinese: 我心里涌出一种别样的感觉
english: This weird feeling started taking over in the pit of my stomach

chinese: 我讨厌这种感觉
english: and I didn't like it.

chinese: 我不能再错下去了
english: I was slipping, man.

chinese: 是时候及时清醒了
english: And it was time to get a grip.

chinese: 我从未因家庭的遭遇感到不幸
english: I'd never been embarrassed by where we lived before.

chinese: 我也从没想过钱的问题
english: I also never really thought about money.

chinese: 虽然我们并不富有 却也不觉生活贫乏
english: I knew we weren't rich, but I didn't feel like we were missing anything.

chinese: 直到布莱斯·罗斯基说我家简直一团糟
english: That is, until Bryce Loski called our home a complete mess.

english: * What's your name? *        * What's your name? *

chinese: * 玛丽还是苏? *
english: * Is it Mary or Sue? *

chinese: * 你叫什么名字? *
english: * What's your name? *

chinese: * 我们能否在一起? *
english: * Do I stand a chance with you? *

chinese: * 我从未如此 *
english: * It's so hard to find a personality *

chinese: * 对他人感到着迷 *
english: * With charms like yours for me *

chinese: 我必须有所行动 我很清楚应该怎么做
english: I had to do something and I knew what it was.

chinese: * 你叫什么名字? *
english: * What's your name? *

chinese: 你们唱得真棒
english: Oh, you're sounding really good.

chinese: 我们会去斯凯勒家的车库录音
english: We'll record it in Skyler's garage.

chinese: 这计划真不错
english: That's a wonderful project.

chinese: 说到计划
english: Speaking of projects,

chinese: 我想把院子修整一下
english: I was thinking it might be cool to fix up the yard.

chinese: 什么?      草种子应该不贵吧?
english: What?        I mean, how much can grass seed cost?

english: I could plant a lawn, maybe some flowers.

chinese: 甚至可以筑道篱笆
english: I could even put up a fence.

chinese: 宝贝儿 这可是个大工程
english: Honey, that's a major undertaking.

chinese: 我可以用卖鸡蛋的钱来修
english: I could pay for it with my egg money.

chinese: 不行 那是你的钱
english: No. That's your money.

chinese: 这事应该由房东来打理
english: The landlord should be the one taking care of all this.

chinese: 可他不是毫无行动么 住在这里的人是我们
english: But he doesn't. And we live here.

chinese: 院子看上去乱糟糟的

chinese: 朱莉

chinese: 出什么事了?

chinese: 没什么 爸爸
english: Nothing, Dad.

chinese: 没事的 宝贝儿

chinese: 跟我们说说吧

english: The Loskis have been throwing away my eggs

chinese: 他们担心会有沙门氏菌
english: because they're afraid of salmonella.

chinese: 因为我们家院子乱糟糟的
english: Because our yard is such a mess.

chinese: 这话是帕蒂说的吗?
english: Did Patsy say that?

chinese: 不是 布莱斯说的

chinese: 但他们全家肯定都这么想

chinese: 小男孩是不会思考这种问题的
english: A boy doesn't come up with that on his own.

english: Who cares what they think?

chinese: 就是啊 关我们什么事?
english: Yeah, who cares?

chinese: 可我在意      蒂娜
english: I care.        Trina.

chinese: 别往心里去
english: Let's not get into this.

chinese: 不 我受够了 理查德
english: No, I'm tired of living like this, Richard.

chinese: 为了把账单付清 不得不去打小工
english: I'm tired of having to take temp jobs just to make ends meet.

english: Sometimes you have to sacrifice to do the right thing.

chinese: 看到父母大动干戈

chinese: 今晚的事我很抱歉

english: My father talked about his brother and how much he loved him

english: and how he promised his parents he'd always take care of him.

english: I felt sorry for my father.

english: But most of all, I felt lucky for me that they were mine.

english: I wanted to think the reason I started working on my yard

english: had nothing to do with Bryce.

english: Hi. I'm Chet Duncan, Bryce's grandfather.

chinese: 不好意思 过了这么久才来打招呼
english: Sorry it's taken me so long to come over and introduce myself.

chinese: 切特
english: Chet.

english: I don't need your help.

chinese: 我在报纸上看到关于你的报道
english: Read about you in the paper.

english: She would've sat up there all night.

chinese: 芮妮?

chinese: 我妻子

english: You remind me a lot of her.

chinese: 我们在院子里忙活了几个星期
english: We worked on the yard for weeks.

chinese: 我们一边干活 一边聊天
english: And the whole time we worked, we talked.

chinese: 你那好了没?      好了

chinese: 他想了解无花果树
english: He wanted to know more about the sycamore tree.

chinese: 他非常清楚
english: He knew exactly what it meant

chinese: 整体胜于部分的总和是什么意思
english: about the whole being greater than the sum of its parts.

chinese: 他说人也如此
english: He said it was the same with people

chinese: 但有时候 人还没那么好
english: but sometimes with people, the whole could be less.

chinese: 我觉得很有意思
english: I thought that was pretty interesting.

chinese: 我开始重新审视从小学就认识的人们
english: I started looking at people I'd known since elementary school

chinese: 想知道他们
english: trying to figure out if they were

chinese: 是不是整体胜于全部
english: more or less than the sum of their parts.

chinese: 切特说得对 很多人还不如
english: Chet was right. A lot of them were less.

chinese: 在我所有同学中 只有布莱斯不知该归到哪类
english: Of all my classmates, the one person I couldn't seem to place was Bryce.

chinese: 要是以前 我会极其肯定地说
english: Until recently, I would've said with absolute certainty

chinese: 他的整体远远好于全部
english: that he was greater, far greater, than the sum of his parts.

chinese: 但现在我不确定了
english: But now I wasn't so sure.

chinese: 很漂亮的院子啊 朱莉 干得好
english: It's looking good, Juli. Nice job.

chinese: 谢谢 这都是切特的功劳
english: Thanks. Chet did most of it.

chinese: 我很抱歉自己的所作所为
english: I'm sorry for what I did.

chinese: 我真想不明白 布莱斯
english: I just don't get it, Bryce.

chinese: 你为什么不直说呢?
english: Why didn't you just tell me?

chinese: 他是真的抱歉吗?
english: Was he really sorry?

chinese: 还是他这样说只是为了让自己好受一点?
english: Or was he just saying these things to make himself feel better?

chinese: 于是我在想 也许他的好
english: Then I thought maybe I just wanted him

chinese: 都只是我的一厢情愿
english: to be more than the sum of his parts.

chinese: 但当我直视他的双眼
english: But as I looked into his eyes

chinese: 那双忽闪忽闪的眼睛
english: those dazzling eyes

chinese: 有生以来第一次
english: for the first time

chinese: 我十分确定布莱斯·罗斯基没那么好
english: I was pretty sure that Bryce Loski was less.

chinese: 我们要请贝克一家来吃晚餐
english: We're going to invite the Bakers over for dinner.

chinese: 啥?      我不懂 妈妈
english: What?        I don't know, Mom.

chinese: 好主意啊
english: I think that's a marvelous idea.

chinese: 帕蒂 什么理由?
english: Patsy, what purpose does this serve?

chinese: 蒂娜·贝克人很好
english: Trina Baker is a very nice person.

chinese: 马特和马克也很有意思      讨厌有意思的人
english: And Matt and Mark are really cool.        I hate cool.

chinese: 早就该请他们过来了
english: Something we should've done years ago.

english: Yeah, but we didn't. And now we can't.

chinese: 时效已经过了
english: The statute of limitations has run out.

chinese: 我们要请贝克一家来吃晚餐
english: We're having the Bakers over for dinner.

chinese: 如果是因为我昨晚说错话了 对不起 行了吧
english: If this is about what I said last night, I'm sorry, okay?

chinese: 但是 请他们吃饭又治不好他哥哥
english: But, you know, having them over for dinner is not gonna fix his brother.

chinese: 到时是晚宴的形式
english: It's going to be a sit-down dinner.

chinese: 我希望大家衣着得体一点
english: And I expect everyone to dress accordingly.

chinese: 天哪 来一顿烧烤不行吗?
english: Oh, God. Can't we just have a barbecue?

chinese: 是晚宴
english: It's going to be a sit-down dinner.

chinese: 杀了我吧
english: Just shoot me now.

chinese: 小心梦想成真
english: Careful what you wish for.

chinese: 嗨 史蒂芬 你好吗
english: Hey, Steven. How are you?

chinese: 我们早该聚聚了 进来吧
english: We should've done this a long time ago. Come on in.

chinese: 你们家真漂亮
english: This is a cool place.

chinese: 凑合吧 来给你们看我的房间
english: Yeah, it's all right. Come on, I'll show you my room.

chinese: 你该听听我们写的新歌
english: You gotta hear this new song we wrote.

chinese: 真不错
english: It's so good.

chinese: 嗨
english: Hi.

chinese: 你打扮得很漂亮
english: You look nice.

chinese: 我听见你和加利特在图书馆嘲笑我伯伯
english: I heard you and Garrett making fun of my uncle in the library.

chinese: 我不想理你了
english: And I don't wanna speak to you.

chinese: 永远也不想理你了
english: Not now, not ever.

chinese: 要我说 你可以      但你的看法
english: And I say you can.        But what you're proposing

chinese: 是要用到一台永动机 这是不可能的
english: would require a perpetual-motion machine, so it's not possible.

chinese: 如果你用一个中性导体传导正负两极
english: If you had two opposite charged poles with a neutral conductor

chinese: 永动机?
english: Perpetual motion?

chinese: 我就站那 内心凌乱中 而他们居然在讨论永动机
english: Here I was, dying inside, and they were talking about perpetual motion.

chinese: 朱莉怎么知道永动机这些名堂的?
english: And how did Juli know about all that stuff?

chinese: 来吧 晚餐好了 丽奈特
english: Come on, everybody, dinner's ready. Lynetta!

chinese: 晚饭好了
english: Dinner!

chinese: 朱莉 能听我解释吗
english: Juli, can I talk to you?

chinese: 加利特说得不对 我知道
english: It was wrong, what Garrett said. I know it.

chinese: 他那样说的时候 你就知道不对了吗
english: Did you know it was wrong when he said it?

chinese: 嗯 我想揍他的
english: Yeah. I wanted to punch him.

chinese: 但那时在图书馆嘛
english: But we were in the library.

chinese: 所以刚好相反 你赞同他说的 还跟他一起笑
english: So instead you just agreed with him and laughed.

chinese: 嗯
english: Yeah.

chinese: 所以你表现得像个懦夫
english: Then that makes you a coward.

chinese: 整顿晚餐 我都傻愣愣地坐在朱莉对面
english: I had to sit across from Juli for an entire dinner.

chinese: 爸爸说得对
english: My dad was right.

chinese: 我们应该吃烧烤的
english: We should have barbecued.

chinese: 我只想说 能邀请你们共进晚餐是多么美好
english: I just want to say how wonderful it is to have you share a meal with us.

chinese: 可能这只是我们以后无数次晚餐的开始
english: May it be the first of many.

chinese: 嗓子痒
english: Wrong pipe.

chinese: 我们也开心极了
english: Well, we couldn't be happier.

chinese: 我们能到你家做客 都感到很荣幸
english: We are just all so thrilled to be here.

chinese: 朱莉 你把你们家院子收拾得真漂亮
english: Juli, you did a really nice job on your yard.

chinese: 谢谢 切特帮了大忙
english: Thanks. Chet was a big help.

chinese: 嗯 我知道
english: Yeah, I know.

chinese: 你必须把秘诀告诉我
english: You gotta tell me your secret.

chinese: 切特在家是什么事都不肯做的
english: I can't get him to do a thing around here.

chinese: 史蒂芬      我开玩笑的
english: Steven.        I kid.

chinese: 跟你说 这个街坊就快恢复生机了
english: I'm telling you, the neighborhood is really coming to life.

chinese: 新修的房子也快成形了
english: I mean, that new house is taking shape.

chinese: 哪个?
english: Which one?

chinese: 就是挨着以前那棵丑八怪大树的房子
english: You know, the one where they cut down that big ugly tree.

chinese: 我想说很多人都喜欢那棵树 但不包括我
english: I wanted to say that a lot of people liked that tree, but I didn't.

chinese: 我不想反驳爸爸
english: I didn't want to go against my dad.

chinese: 有人认为那棵树是这片小区的珍珠
english: Some people thought that tree was the jewel of the neighborhood.

chinese: 嗯 这样说的人什么品味啊
english: Yeah, well, there's no accounting for taste.

chinese: 马特 马克 马克 马特
english: So, Matt, Mark, Mark, Matt

chinese: 你们过阵子就该毕业了吧
english: You guys are, uh, gonna be graduating soon, huh?

chinese: 嗯 谢天谢地啊
english: Yeah, thank God.

chinese: 你们不喜欢高中吗
english: You don't like high school?

chinese: 你开玩笑?      不喜欢
english: You kidding?        No.

chinese: 高中是我生命中最快乐的时光
english: High school was the best time of my life.

chinese: 对我们来说不是      我们已经受够了高中
english: Not for us, no.        Yeah, we've had enough of that scene.

chinese: 所以 你们不打算读大学了?
english: So college is probably out of the question, huh?

chinese: 不 可能去读
english: No, it's a possibility.

chinese: 其实他们已经
english: They've actually been accepted

chinese: 被几所大学录取了      就是
english: at several places already.        Yes, they have.

chinese: 真的吗
english: Really?

chinese: 太好了
english: Well, that's good.

chinese: 但是 我们想先做做音乐
english: But, um, we're gonna give music a shot first.

chinese: 真的?      他们在音乐方面很有天分
english: Really?        Oh, they are very talented.

chinese: 他们的乐队很棒
english: Oh, their band is really boss.

chinese: 他们录了些唱片小样 很好听的
english: They did a bunch of demos and they're really cool.

chinese: 谢谢 丽奈特
english: Thanks, Lyn.

chinese: 我第一次认识史蒂芬 他正在乐队里演奏
english: When Steven and I first met, he was playing in a band.

chinese: 你在乐队里演奏?
english: You played in a band?

chinese: 他是一个出色的萨克斯风手
english: He was a wonderful saxophone player.

chinese: 不错啊 你还在演奏吗?      其实我...
english: Cool. You still play?        Well, I...

chinese: 如果你愿意 你可以抽时间来加入我们
english: Well, if you want, you can come jam out with us sometime.

chinese: 你们...
english: Uh, you...

chinese: 我的意思是 不用了
english: No, I mean Heh.

chinese: 我很久不吹了
english: That's not me anymore.

chinese: 你们在舞台上表演过吗?
english: Have you boys ever performed in front of an audience?

chinese: 很多次了
english: A lot of times.

chinese: 马特和马克聊音乐聊得越多
english: The more Matt and Mark talked about their musical exploits

chinese: 我爸爸就越沉默
english: the quieter my dad got.

chinese: 他尝试伪装出一副笑脸
english: He tried to plaster on a smile now and then

chinese: 但内心里他很难过
english: but underneath he seemed really sad.

chinese: 但我父母一开始不喜欢他
english: But my parents didn't like him at first.

chinese: 共和党强烈抵触新政
english: Republicans fought like crazy against the New Deal.

chinese: 晚餐后半截过得不痛不痒
english: The rest of the evening was painless enough.

chinese: 但整顿饭下来 朱莉一个字也没对我说
english: But through it all, Juli didn't say a word to me.

chinese: 连看都不看我一眼
english: Never even looked at me.

chinese: 直到她快要离开
english: Until she was about to leave.

chinese: 我刚进来时情绪太激动了 很抱歉
english: I'm sorry I was so angry when we first came in.

chinese: 大家今晚都过得很开心
english: I think everyone had a good time.

chinese: 你妈妈邀请我们来吃饭 她真好
english: Your mom was really nice to invite us.

chinese: 再见
english: See you.

chinese: 她的道歉让事情变得更糟
english: Her apology made things worse.

chinese: 嗨 等等我      我知道我还是没被原谅
english: Hey, wait for me.        I knew I wasn't forgiven.

chinese: 就像我根本不重要 不值得她生气一样
english: It was like I wasn't even important enough to hold a grudge against.

chinese: 我觉得他们一家挺好的
english: Well, I think they're a delightful family.

chinese: 那两个儿子跟我想的完全不一样
english: Those boys were nothing like I expected.

chinese: 我觉得他们特别优秀
english: I thought they were very nice young men.

chinese: 小兔崽子      什么?
english: Hoodlums.        What?

chinese: 你觉得他们买得起录音设备吗?
english: How you think they can afford all that recording gear?

chinese: 史蒂芬 别说了 你不能随便下判断
english: Steven, please. You can't just make an accusation like that.

chinese: 别这么天真 帕蒂
english: Don't be so naive, Patsy.

chinese: 你知道录一支试样要多少钱吗?
english: Do you know how expensive it is to record a demo?

chinese: 他们说不定还去偷毂盖来凑钱呢
english: They're probably stealing hubcaps, for chrissake.

chinese: 你真混账
english: You are such an asshole.

chinese: 你他妈到底怎么回事?
english: What is the matter with you?

chinese: 去死吧
english: Go to hell.

chinese: 不准那样跟我说话
english: Don't you talk to me like that.

chinese: 史蒂芬 站在
english: Steven, stop!

chinese: 没人敢在我的房子里
english: Nobody talks to me like that

chinese: 那样跟我说话!      回来!
english: in my own house!        Stop!

chinese: 我以前见过爸爸生气的样子 但这次不同
english: I'd seen my father angry before, but this was different.

chinese: 那晚我躺在床上
english: As I lay in bed that night

chinese: 思考为什么爸爸总是瞧不起贝克一家
english: I thought about how my dad always looked down on the Bakers.

chinese: 他总说他们是废物 还嘲笑贝克先生的画
english: And how he'd called them trash and made fun of Mr. Baker's paintings.

chinese: 现在我知道 他只是不满意自己
english: And now I realized he was just mad at himself.

chinese: 但为什么呢
english: But why?

chinese: 朱莉说我是懦夫
english: Juli called me a coward.

chinese: 难道我爸爸也是懦夫
english: Was it possible my dad was a coward too?

chinese: 不知道
english: I didn't know.

chinese: 有什么区别吗
english: What difference did it make?

chinese: 朱莉·贝克从我的生活中消失了
english: Juli Baker was out of my life.

chinese: 或者更确切地说
english: Or, more accurately

chinese: 我从她的生活中消失了
english: I was out of hers.

chinese: 我在为罗斯基家的晚宴准备衣服时
english: As I was getting dressed for the Loskis' dinner party

chinese: 我一直盯着爸爸以前给我的那幅画
english: I found myself staring at the painting my father had given me

chinese: 不禁一肚子气
english: and became furious all over again.

chinese: 布莱斯从来都不算我的朋友
english: Bryce had never been a friend to me, ever.

chinese: 砍树的时候他没站住我这边
english: He hadn't taken my side about the tree

chinese: 他扔掉我的鸡蛋
english: he'd thrown away my eggs

chinese: 他还开我伯伯的玩笑
english: and he made fun of me at my uncle's expense.

chinese: 当妈妈催我们出发时...
english: When my mother called that it was time to go...

chinese: 朱莉 快点 要迟到了
english: Juli, let's go, we're late!

chinese: 我想了千百个借口告诉她
english: I went out with every intention of telling her

chinese: 我不去吃饭了
english: that I wasn't going to the Loskis.

chinese: 拿好这个 我要再次快速地理理发型
english: Please hold these. I need to check my hair really quickly one more time.

chinese: 你的发型棒极了      真的吗
english: Your hair is perfect.        Really?

chinese: 但她看起来如此高兴
english: But she looked so happy

chinese: 她为了做这些馅饼花了那么多心思 我不能不去
english: and she'd gone to so much trouble over the pies that I couldn't.

chinese: 天哪 差点毁了
english: Ooh! Oh, my gosh. Oh, God, what a disaster.

chinese: 好了 拿一个 你拿一个
english: Okay. Here, hold one, and you hold this.

chinese: 我不想拿      我不会让你拿的
english: I don't wanna hold it.        I won't have you hold it.

chinese: 儿子们 出发吧
english: Let's go, boys.

chinese: 但这不代表我要对布莱斯友善
english: But that didn't mean I had to be nice to Bryce.

chinese: 我不想和你说话了
english: And I don't wanna speak to you.

chinese: 现在不想 一辈子都不想了
english: Not now, not ever.

chinese: 主动权在我手里的感觉真好
english: It felt good to take charge.

chinese: 我觉得自己能掌控一切 我告诉布莱斯我的想法
english: I felt strong, in control. I told Bryce what I thought

chinese: 也决心晚上不再跟他说话
english: and I was determined not to talk to him for the rest of the evening.

chinese: 晚餐时 我突然觉得
english: At dinner it struck me that

chinese: 我们在和一群陌生人共进晚餐
english: we were sharing a meal with a group of strangers.

chinese: 我们本来常年住在罗斯基家对街 不相来往
english: We'd lived across the street from the Loskis for years

chinese: 除了切特 这些人我都不了解
english: but except for Chet, I didn't know these people at all.

chinese: 罗斯基先生表面上看起来很干净整洁
english: Mr. Loski was clean and smooth on the outside

chinese: 但他内心似乎装着
english: but it seemed like there was something rotten

chinese: 什么腐烂掉的东西
english: buried just beneath the surface.

chinese: 晚饭快结束的时候 我觉得我像个局外人 旁观者
english: By the end of the evening, all I felt was detached, neutral.

chinese: 没有烟火 没有残余的气愤
english: No fireworks, no leftover anger

chinese: 没有奉承谁
english: no flutters, nothing.

chinese: 再见
english: See you.

chinese: 我入睡的时候 感觉很平和
english: I went to bed that night feeling peaceful.

chinese: 你还好吗?      很好啊
english: You okay?        Yeah.

chinese: 我很庆幸 有现在这样的家庭
english: I was grateful that I had the family I had.

chinese: 我再也不用关心布莱斯·罗斯基了 这感觉真好
english: And it felt good to no longer care about Bryce Loski.

chinese: 跟贝克一家共进晚餐后 我的人品就一路狂跌
english: The dinner with the Bakers had taken its toll on me.

chinese: 学校一年一度的筹款活动到了
english: Then the annual school fundraiser arrived

chinese: 我陷入一堆新难题
english: and I found myself with a whole new set of problems.

chinese: 我要做篮子男孩
english: I was a Basketboy.

chinese: 要欣赏篮子男孩遭到羞辱的盛况
english: To fully appreciate the humiliation of being a Basketboy

chinese: 你要知道被选中的男孩
english: you need to know that the chosen few

chinese: 要当着所有同学的面
english: are auctioned off in front of the student body

chinese: 被拍卖给出价最高的女生
english: to the highest-bidding females.

chinese: 虽然我们每个人都在篮子里放了午饭
english: Yes, technically, each of us comes with a lunch in a basket

chinese: 但还是不要自欺欺人了 这是裸男大游行
english: but let's not kid ourselves. This was a beefcake parade.

chinese: 我的偶像 在这呢
english: There he is, my idol.

chinese: 一句话 你死定了
english: One word, you're a dead man.

chinese: 不 我认真的 你肯定不相信我
english: No, man, I'm serious. Listen, you won't believe this.

chinese: 什么?
english: What?

chinese: 两个极品小妞正在争着要你呢
english: Two of the hottest chicks are fighting over you.

chinese: 你在说什么?      雪利和米奇分手了
english: What are you talking about?        Sherry is breaking up with Mitch.

chinese: 她和米娜妮会在拍卖会上争夺你
english: She and Melanie are having a bidding war over you.

chinese: 我不在乎
english: I don't care.

chinese: 你傻了吗? 雪利跟米奇分手是因为你
english: Are you nuts? Sherry dumped Mitch because of you.

chinese: 你是我的偶像
english: You're my idol.

chinese: 虽然成为加利特的偶像让人欣慰
english: As comforting as it was to be Garrett's idol

chinese: 但是要做篮子男孩 想想就很害怕
english: it didn't diminish the horror of being Basketboy number nine.

chinese: 我唯一的期望就是来场龙卷风
english: And my only hope was that a giant tornado

chinese: 在拍卖会之前把学校夷为平地
english: would destroy the school before the event.

chinese: 几乎没有可能
english: It was a long shot.

chinese: 欢迎大家
english: Welcome, everyone

chinese: 参加今年梅菲尔德拍卖会
english: to this year's Mayfield Boosters Club Auction.

chinese: 再一次让我们荣幸地请出
english: Once again we are pleased to present

chinese: 20位梅菲尔德的年轻人      布莱斯 布莱斯
english: 20 of Mayfield's finest young men        Bryce, Bryce.

chinese: 布莱斯
english: Bryce.

chinese: 你来这干什么      朱莉坐第三排
english: What are you doing here?        Juli's in the third row.

chinese: 然后呢?      她拿了一大把钱
english: So?        So she's got a wad of cash.

chinese: 鬼话      真话
english: Bullshit.        Bull-true.

chinese: 我看见她在储物柜旁数钱了
english: I saw her counting it by her locker.

chinese: 现在
english: And now

chinese: 请用热烈的掌声
english: please give a big Mayfield School welcome

chinese: 欢迎1963年的篮子男孩们
english: to your 1963 Basketboys.

chinese: 朱莉带现金了? 这代表什么?
english: Juli with cash? What did this mean?

chinese: 她有可能向我投标吗
english: Was it possible she was gonna bid on me?

chinese: 第一位 我们请到了
english: First up, we have

chinese: 雷蒙·休
english: Raymond Hughes.

chinese: 雷蒙来自围棋队
english: Raymond's on the chess team

chinese: 他喜欢集邮和玩悠悠球
english: and his hobbies include stamp collecting and the yo-yo.

chinese: 记住 当你竞标时
english: Remember, when you bid

chinese: 你得到的不止是帅气的休先生
english: you'll not only be getting the handsome Mr. Hughes

chinese: 你还会享受
english: you'll also be enjoying

chinese: 一份可爱的鸡肉沙拉三明治
english: a lovely chicken-salad sandwich

chinese: 和一份看上去很香的豆酱
english: and what looks to be a tasty bean dip, and

chinese: 对不起 是洋葱沙司
english: Oh. Excuse me, onion dip.

chinese: 和一大片樱桃派
english: And a big slice of cherry pie.

chinese: 好了 起拍价5美元
english: Okay, who will start the bidding at $5?

chinese: 拍卖开始了      有人吗
english: Thus began the bidding.        Anybody?

chinese: 或者就雷蒙·休个案来说 没有出价的
english: Or in Raymond Hughes' case, the lack of bidding.

chinese: 很好 就是你了
english: Very good, here we go.

chinese: 5美元      一次
english: Five.        Sold.

chinese: 10美元      一次
english: Ten dollars.        Sold.

chinese: 15美元      一次
english: Fifteen.        Sold.

chinese: 有出10美元的吗
english: Come on. Do I hear 10?

chinese: 10美元       10美元
english: Ten.        Ten.

chinese: 10美元      花生酱香蕉三明治
english: Ten.        Peanut-butter-and-banana sandwich.

chinese: 15美元
english: Fifteen.

chinese: 15美元成交
english: Sold for $15.

chinese: 第八位是艾迪·图鲁克
english: Number eight is Eddie Trulock.

chinese: 艾迪是辩论队的一员
english: Eddie is a member of the debate team.

chinese: 现在我和拍卖台之间只隔着艾迪
english: Now only Eddie Trulock stood between me and the auction block.

chinese: 我对他的爱好和他篮子里的食物一点也不感兴趣
english: I wasn't interested in his hobbies or what was in his basket.

chinese: 5美元开始出价      我心里全想着朱莉
english: Let's start the bidding at $5.        All I could think of was Juli.

chinese: 有人吗?      要是她投我怎么办
english: Anybody?        What if she did bid on me?

chinese: 要是她和雪利 米娜妮一起争我 输掉了怎么办
english: What if she got in a bidding war with Sherry and Melanie and lost out?
